name: Project Flesh
description:
Project Flesh is a 2D randomly generated dungeon crawler/ Rogue-like, set deep in the sewers under a nameless city, the goal is to survive and make it through all the floors, equipping yourself with the limbs of mutated creatures you kill. In the hope to eventually find the creature that mutated you and put an end to it's experiments.

Main Features

  • Random level generation, with over 50 pipe and room layouts
  • Many limbs and power ups to choose from
  • Random chests and hidden rooms
  • Roulette Shop
  • Tons of enemies - Bird,rat,Cobra,Praying Mantis, Rabbit,Snail Hedgehog, failed experiments and more
  • complete customisation of the player
  • Challenges
  • Extreme mode
  • unique move sets
  • Original music
